original_text: “Bezalel and Oholiab and every craftsman in whom the Lord has put skill and intelligence to know how to do any work in the construction of the sanctuary shall work in accordance with all that the Lord has commanded.”
korean_text: 브살렐과 오홀리압과 및 마음이 지혜로운 사람 곧 여호와께서 지혜와 총명을 부으사 성소에 쓸 모든 일을 할 줄 알게 하신 자들은 모두 여호와께서 명령하신 대로 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: in whom the Lord has put skill and intelligence
to know how to do any work
in the construction of the sanctuary
in accordance with all that the Lord has commanded
